name: The Purple One
preparation:
This pleasantly purple gin cocktail features a fermented Concord grape soda that Bar Tartine makes with local organic grape juice. (At home, you can use a good-quality grape soda like Boylan's in its place.)

Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a Martini glass.

Top with .75 to 1 ounce Concord grape soda.
